quest.name: Reclaiming the Taste of Home
journal:
Stigma-4 requires the assistance of a life-form quick on their feet.

※Please note that the difficulty of this quest has been synced to your current level. Furthermore, you may not proceed with a class or job that is different from when you accepted this quest.
Speak with the advanced culinary research unit at the Elysian playgrounds.
Deliver the requested items to the advanced culinary research unit.
objectives: Speak with the advanced culinary research unit at the Elysian playgrounds.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Research is underway to develop a new menu for draconic patrons of the Last Dregs. At present, preliminary trials using resources available on Elysion are being performed to recreate the “taste of home” the dragons once enjoyed on their planet.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: It has been proposed that an organic life-form's touch may aid in this effort, and for that reason, your services are requested. Receive the full mission briefing from the advanced culinary research unit stationed in the Elysion area dedicated to youth recreation.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04630
dialogue.text: <whirr> Allied life-form recognized. This unit will now proceed to mission briefing.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04630
dialogue.text: Your mission is thus: procure samples of worms that appeal to the gustatory inputs of organic life-forms from rocky outcrops in the vicinity, and deliver them to present coordinates at maximum achievable speed.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04630
dialogue.text: Your mission is thus: procure samples of true dragon fruit from vegetation patches in the vicinity, and deliver them to present coordinates at maximum achievable speed.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04630
dialogue.text: Your mission is thus: procure a sample of dragon's delight from a water hole in the vicinity, and deliver it to present coordinates at maximum achievable speed. Use of gold salmon roe in its retrieval recommended.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04630
dialogue.text: Procure samples of worms that appeal to the gustatory inputs of organic life-forms from rocky outcrops in the vicinity, and deliver them to present coordinates at maximum achievable speed.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04630
dialogue.text: Procure samples of true dragon fruit from vegetation patches in the vicinity, and deliver them to present coordinates at maximum achievable speed.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04630
dialogue.text: Procure a sample of dragon's delight from a water hole in the vicinity, and deliver it to present coordinates at maximum achievable speed. Use of gold salmon roe in its retrieval recommended.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04630
dialogue.text: <whirr> Analysis of allied life-form's dimpled facial expression suggests mission was successful. Immediate transfer of the requested items is desired.

dialogue.name: DELIVERER04630
dialogue.text: Bzzzt... This unit can confirm the delivered items fall within acceptable parameters. Preparing to display appreciation for allied life-form's cooperation: thank you. Return to Stigma-4 for mission debriefing and compensation.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: The advanced culinary research unit sent communication of mission success. Forename's contribution was noted favorably.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Current evaluation of the difficulty of mission to recreate comestibles native to the Dragonstar remains high at present, but within realistic boundaries nonetheless. Further analysis of available culinary methods necessary.

dialogue.name: STIGMA4
dialogue.text: Additional problems are anticipated. The dragons' prodigious size necessitates that a sustainable means of amassing enough provisions to satisfy their appetite be determined. Research and development of aquaculture done in parallel may prove a promising solution...
